ch.ethz.inf.vs.persistingservice.database
Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.inf.vs.persistingservice.database.DatabaseConnection

public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object

The Class DatabaseConnection starts the http client to acess the couchdb database. It uses the standard couchdb port of 5984. A couchdbconnector for the database "californiumdb" is created.

Method Detail

startDB

public void startDB()
Start db creates the http client to access the couchdb database. A standard couchdbconnector is created for the database "californiumdb".

getCouchDbConnector

public static org.ektorp.CouchDbConnector getCouchDbConnector()
Gets the couch db connector to access the database "californiumdb".

Returns:
the couch db connector initialized by startDB.
